messages.title: BUILDING A BRIGHTER FUTURE FOR PUTNEY

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Sue has stood up to Labour and the Conservatives and their Brexit plans.
A 30-year career in the charity sector. Played a key role in the global campaign to end blindness with the Nobel Prize.
Sue moved to London over 20 years ago and has lived in Putney for the last ten.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Lib Dems are the only remain party that can win here. Remainers from both Labour and the Conservatives are flocking to the Liberal Democrats as the largest and strongest party of Remain.
